stories.Title: Open for business
stories.Description: OpenAI's long-awaited GPT Store has finally arrived. Users with premium plans can now enjoy customized AI models across a vast array of categories, from lifestyle to programming.
stories.Tweet: Open for business 📦 OpenAI's long-awaited GPT Store has finally arrived. Users with premium plans can now enjoy customized AI models across a vast array of categories, from lifestyle to programming. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2024/01/10/openai-launches-a-store-for-custom-ai-powered-chatbots/

stories.Title: OpenAI’s new plan
stories.Description: Following the launch of the GPT Store, OpenAI has unveiled a new subscription plan aimed at small teams, granting them access to GPT-4 and DALL-E 3, along with a variety of tools.
stories.Tweet: OpenAI’s new plan 📦 Following the launch of the GPT Store, OpenAI has unveiled a new subscription plan aimed at small teams, granting them access to GPT-4 and DALL-E 3, along with a variety of tools. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2024/01/10/openai-launches-chatgpt-subscription-aimed-at-small-teams/

stories.Title: Bill Gates: A ChatGPT admirer
stories.Description: In an interview that you don't want to miss, two masterminds sat down to discuss AI. Bill Gates admitted to Sam Altman that ChatGPT's capabilities completely took him by surprise.
stories.Tweet: Bill Gates: A ChatGPT admirer 📦 In an interview that you don't want to miss, two masterminds sat down to discuss AI. Bill Gates admitted to Sam Altman that ChatGPT's capabilities completely took him by surprise. #ai https://www.axios.com/2024/01/11/bill-gates-sam-altman-interview-chatgpt

stories.Title: Copilot goes turbo
stories.Description: There's an alternative if you want to try out the power of GPT-4 Turbo. Just go through Copilot! Microsoft's chatbot provides the capabilities of OpenAI's most recent model for free.
stories.Tweet: Copilot goes turbo 📦 There's an alternative if you want to try out the power of GPT-4 Turbo. Just go through Copilot! Microsoft's chatbot provides the capabilities of OpenAI's most recent model for free. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/gpt-4-turbo-now-powers-microsoft-copilot-heres-how-to-check-if-you-have-access/

stories.Title: Focusing on resilience
stories.Description: It's easy to believe that NASA's CLPS initiative is off to a bittersweet start with the failure of Astrobotic's Peregrine-1 mission, but even with setbacks, they're still up for great success.
stories.Tweet: Focusing on resilience 📦 It's easy to believe that NASA's CLPS initiative is off to a bittersweet start with the failure of Astrobotic's Peregrine-1 mission, but even with setbacks, they're still up for great success. #rocketscience https://gizmodo.com/what-peregrine-failure-means-for-nasa-clps-1851155515

stories.Title: It's Vulcan time
stories.Description: Amid Astrobotic's challenges, United Launch Alliance's Vulcan rocket has surpassed all expectations in its maiden flight, emerging as a strong contender to SpaceX's Falcon 9.
stories.Tweet: It's Vulcan time 📦 Amid Astrobotic's challenges, United Launch Alliance's Vulcan rocket has surpassed all expectations in its maiden flight, emerging as a strong contender to SpaceX's Falcon 9. #rocketscience https://arstechnica.com/space/2024/01/after-its-impressive-first-flight-heres-whats-next-for-the-vulcan-rocket/

stories.Title: All the way from space
stories.Description: As they continue their efforts to expand into space-based communications, SpaceX has announced that they've exchanged the first text messages through its direct-to-device Starlink satellites.
stories.Tweet: All the way from space 📦 As they continue their efforts to expand into space-based communications, SpaceX has announced that they've exchanged the first text messages through its direct-to-device Starlink satellites. #spacex https://www.engadget.com/spacex-and-t-mobile-send-the-first-text-messages-from-orbiting-starlink-satellites-103526219.html

stories.Title: Looking on the bright side
stories.Description: Making the most of the circumstances, Astrobotic continues to grasp all it can from its journey to space, gathering data from nine active payloads, including NASA's experiments.
stories.Tweet: Looking on the bright side 📦 Making the most of the circumstances, Astrobotic continues to grasp all it can from its journey to space, gathering data from nine active payloads, including NASA's experiments. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/astrobotic-gets-payloads-working-on-ailing-peregrine-lander/

stories.Title: Great things take a while
stories.Description: Japan's trip to Mars is facing a two-year delay. JAXA has stated that current challenges with the H3 rocket must undergo meticulous verification to ensure the mission's success.
stories.Tweet: Great things take a while 📦 Japan's trip to Mars is facing a two-year delay. JAXA has stated that current challenges with the H3 rocket must undergo meticulous verification to ensure the mission's success. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/japanese-mars-mission-launch-delayed-to-2026/

stories.Title: Exclusive for EVs
stories.Description: BMW is on track to establish itself as an EV leader. After a great year of sales, the automaker is making a $711 million investment to transform its Munich factory into an exclusive hub for EV manufacturing.
stories.Tweet: Exclusive for EVs 📦 BMW is on track to establish itself as an EV leader. After a great year of sales, the automaker is making a $711 million investment to transform its Munich factory into an exclusive hub for EV manufacturing. #BMW https://electrek.co/2024/01/11/bmw-spends-billions-to-push-its-next-gen-evs-into-tesla-territory/

title: GPT Store has arrived, Gates and Altman's AI talk, OpenAI's plan for teams
description: The wait is finally over – OpenAI's GPT Store has officially launched! If you're looking for a GPT tailored to the quirkiest topic you can think of, just head on over. Bill Gates had a cool guest on his podcast, none other than Sam Altman, and yup, they talked about all things AI. Don't miss it! Also, speaking of them, OpenAI just rolled out a new ChatGPT subscription plan for small teams. Go spread the word to your coworkers!
